subdisciplines.name: Opinion Writing
subdisciplines.description: The art of expressing viewpoint or argument in written form for a specific audience.

subdisciplines.name: Op-Eds
subdisciplines.description: A page opposite the editorial page of a newspaper, written by a guest columnist, often an expert in the field, presenting an opinion in opposition to the newspaper's editorial views.

subdisciplines.name: Political Commentary
subdisciplines.description: The expression of opinions and views on political events and topics, often by journalists or political analysts.
